comment.body:
I just did a test without any AdGuard products / services being installed or used.

Microsoft Edge with Norton Safe Web, Malwarebytes Browser Guard, LanguageTool, Video DownloadHelper, and uBlock Origin (all default lists, Ublock Annoyances, all security lists enabled), CleanBrowsing DNS Adult Filter, and I was able to log in without any problems.

comment.body:
Unfortunately, I cannot reproduce it.
Please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings, restart Safari and check for filters update.
Do not close AdGuard app until filters will be updated.

If issue will still occurs then try to add this rule:
```adblock
everybump.com.au##a[href^="https://t.cfjump.com/"][target="_blank"] > img
```
to user rules.
